memberdef.name: CREATE_2D_ONLY_FILTER_FUNCTOR
memberdef.initializer: /*! \brief Helper class to use Image<T,N>::compute<FilterName>() */ \ template <typename T, int N> struct FilterName; \ template <typename T> struct FilterName<T,2> \ { \ typedef Image<T> ReturnType; \ inline FilterName(const Image<T>& src) : src_(src) {} \ inline ReturnType operator()() const { return function(src_); } \ const Image<T>& src_; \ }

memberdef.name: CREATE_2D_ONLY_FILTER_FUNCTOR_WITH_PARAM
memberdef.initializer: /*! \brief Helper class to use Image<T,N>::compute<FilterName>() */ \ template <typename T, int N> struct FilterName; \ template <typename T> struct FilterName<T,2> \ { \ typedef Image<T> ReturnType; \ typedef typename ColorTraits<T>::ChannelType ParamType; \ inline FilterName(const Image<T>& src) : src_(src) {} \ inline ReturnType operator()(const ParamType& param) const \ { return function(src_, param); } \ const Image<T>& src_; \ }
